The Buddha said, Good men, listen single-mindedly!🔽I will now explain for you the method of the dhāraṇī of the Buddha's crown, which is able to eliminate all calamities and bring about all benefits.🔽
Ratnasaṃbhava,🔽bodhisattva,🔽if there are good men,🔽good women, who wish

Those who wish to cultivate the maṇḍala,🔽how should they proceed, O World-Honored One?🔽The Buddha said, Excellent, excellent!🔽O son of a good family of the Śākya clan, you have been born with sharp faculties and will benefit many.🔽For the sake of all sentient beings, you have given rise to the mind of great compassion and wish to bring peace and happiness to the multitude.🔽You have given rise to the wisdom and knowledge of the three times.

Therefore, one should know that these eight are the seeds of good sons and daughters.🔽The mind of the bodhisattva is like a seed.🔽By means of this, one who is able to extinguish all the sins of immediate retribution,🔽and all the other sins, will attain🔽
